alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 8:26AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern De Soto, west central Natchitoches, northern Sabine Parishes in northwestern Louisiana and northeastern Shelby Counties through 900 AM CDT... At 826 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Joaquin to 15 miles south of Coushatta. Movement was south at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Natchitoches, Zwolle, Logansport, Joaquin, Converse, Shelbyville, Allen, Oak Grove, Pleasant Hill, Provencal, Natchez, Huxley, Noble, Robeline, Stanley, Melrose, Belmont, Pelican, Marthaville and Ajax. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for northwestern Louisiana...and eastern Texas.
